# Introduction




# Local Files

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

localpath <- './DATA/'

filenames <- list.files(path = localpath, pattern = '0015[0-9]_DeviceStatus.csv$')
filepaths <- paste(localpath, filenames, sep = '')

# Initialize Empty Tibble
df <- tibble()
for (i in 1:length(filepaths)) {
  tmp <- read_csv(filepaths[i])
  df <- rbind(df, tmp)
}



```
